00013 #ifndef __VML_MODE_H__
00014 #define __VML_MODE_H__
00015 
00016 #include "mkl_vml_errors.h"
00017 
00018 
00019 /* Defines for accuracy setting LA or HA */
00020 #define VML_LA                          0x001
00021 #define VML_HA                          0x002
00022 
00023 /* Defines for precision setting mode (to set or not to set :0)) */
00024 #define VML_DEFAULT_PRECISION           0x000
00025 #define VML_FLOAT_CONSISTENT            0x010
00026 #define VML_DOUBLE_CONSISTENT           0x020
00027 #define VML_RESTORE                     0x030
00028 
00029 /* Defines for error modes  */
00030 #define VML_ERRMODE_IGNORE              0x0100
00031 #define VML_ERRMODE_ERRNO               0x0200
00032 #define VML_ERRMODE_STDERR              0x0400
00033 #define VML_ERRMODE_EXCEPT              0x0800
00034 #define VML_ERRMODE_CALLBACK            0x1000
00035 #define VML_ERRMODE_DEFAULT             VML_ERRMODE_ERRNO | VML_ERRMODE_CALLBACK | VML_ERRMODE_EXCEPT
00036 
00037 /* Mask for accuracy setting separation */
00038 #define VML_ACCURACY_MASK               0x000f
00039 /* Mask for precision setting separation */
00040 #define VML_FPUMODE_MASK                0x00f0
00041 /* Mask for error mode separation */
00042 #define VML_ERRMODE_MASK                0xff00
00043
